entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
